sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Caterpillar ( CAT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.8%.
Year to date, Caterpillar registers a 2.8% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Johnson & Johnson ( JNJ ), trading down 1.9%.
Johnson & Johnson is showing a gain of 6.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 1.6%, and Intel ( INTC ), trading up 1.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
